meanings.sent1: The nonscheduled meeting caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The nonscheduled event was a pleasant surprise for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The nonscheduled picnic turned out to be a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her nonscheduled visit brought a burst of joy into our day.
meanings.sent5: The nonscheduled fireworks display lit up the night sky unexpectedly.

meanings.definition: Not following a set timetable or routine
meanings.sent1: The nonscheduled bus arrived early today.
meanings.sent2: Her nonscheduled breaks allowed for flexibility in her workday.
meanings.sent3: The nonscheduled dance party added a spark of excitement to the evening.
meanings.sent4: The nonscheduled rain shower disrupted the outdoor plans.
meanings.sent5: The nonscheduled power outage left everyone in the dark for hours.
